Description (Short): 20% chance to confuse the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。迷昏拳有20%的几率使目标陷入混乱状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 20% de confundir al rival.

Name: Doom Desire
Description (Short): Hits two turns after being used.
Description (Chinese Short): 使用招式２回合后，会用无数道光束攻击对手。
Description (Spanish Short): Este ataque golpeará al objetivo al final del segundo turno tras su uso. Mientras, se pueden usar otros ataques y tanto el usuario como el rival pueden ser intercambiados.

Name: Double-Edge
Description (Short): Has 33% recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。使用者承受对目标造成伤害的1⁄3的伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca un daño de retroceso al usuario equivalente al 33% del daño provocado al rival.

Name: Double Hit
Description (Short): Hits 2 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害，一回合内连续攻击2次。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea 2 veces seguidas.

Name: Double Iron Bash
Description (Short): Hits twice. 30% chance to flinch.
Description (Chinese Short): 连续攻击对手两次。钢拳双击有30%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 50% de intoxicar al rival.

Name: Double Kick
Description (Short): Hits 2 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害，一回合内连续攻击2次。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea 2 veces seguidas.

Name: Double Slap
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害，一回合内连续攻击2～5次。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea de 2 a 5 veces seguidas.

Name: Double Team
Description (Short): Raises the user's evasiveness by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 令使用者的闪避率提升1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel la Evasión al usuario.

Name: Draco Meteor
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。令使用者的特攻降低2级。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de reducir dos niveles el Ataque Especial al usuario.

Name: Dragon Ascent
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。令使用者的防御、特防各降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel la Defensa y la Defensa Especial al usuario.

Name: Dragon Breath
Description (Short): 30% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。并有30%的几率使目标陷入麻痹状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de paralizar al rival.

Name: Dragon Claw
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Dragon Dance
Description (Short): Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 令使用者的攻击、速度各提升1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel el Ataque y la Velocidad al usuario.

Name: Dragon Darts
Description (Short): Hits twice. Doubles: Tries to hit each foe once.
Description (Chinese Short): 进行２次攻击。如果对手有２只宝可梦，则对它们各进行１次攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Hits twice. Doubles: Tries to hit each foe once.

Name: Dragon Energy
Description (Short): Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。威力随自身剩余ＨＰ减少而减少。
Description (Spanish Short): Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

Name: Dragon Hammer
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Dragon Pulse
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Dragon Rage
Description (Short): Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 固定造成40点ＨＰ伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Causa un daño de 40 PS al Pokémon rival.

Name: Dragon Rush
Description (Short): 20% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。并有20%的几率使目标陷入畏缩状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 20% de hacer retroceder al rival. Golpea a Pokémon que han usado Reducción con el doble de poder base e ignorando su Evasión.

Name: Dragon Tail
Description (Short): Forces the target to switch to a random ally.
Description (Chinese Short): 强制使队伍中下一只没有陷入濒死状态的宝可梦替换上场。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca el intercambio del Pokémon objetivo por el siguiente de su equipo en orden. Termina las batallas contra Pokémon salvajes.

Name: Draining Kiss
Description (Short): User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害，自身的ＨＰ恢复造成的伤害的75%。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera PS equivalente al 75% del daño causado.

Name: Drain Punch
Description (Short): User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害，自身的ＨＰ恢复造成的伤害的50%。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera PS equivalente a la mitad del daño causado.

Name: Dream Eater
Description (Short): User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害，自身的ＨＰ恢复造成的伤害的50%。
Description (Spanish Short): Restaura PS equivalente a la mitad del daño hecho al rival. Surte efectos sólo si el objetivo está dormido.

Name: Drill Peck
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Drill Run
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。击中要害率比普通招式高1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Alta probabilidad de Golpe Crítico.

Name: Drum Beating
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。100%几率令目标的速度降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

Name: Dual Chop
Description (Short): Hits 2 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害，一回合内连续攻击2次。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea 2 veces seguidas.

Name: Dual Wingbeat
Description (Short): Hits 2 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害，一回合内连续攻击2次。
Description (Spanish Short): Hits 2 times in one turn.

Name: Dynamax Cannon
Description (Short): Damage doubles if the target is Dynamaxed.
Description (Chinese Short): 从核心放出光束进行攻击。如果对手正处于极巨化状态，则造成的伤害会变为２倍。
Description (Spanish Short): Damage doubles if the target is Dynamaxed.

Name: Dynamic Punch
Description (Short): 100% chance to confuse the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出浑身力气出拳进行攻击。必定会使对手混乱。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de confundir al rival.

Name: Earth Power
Description (Short): 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手脚下释放出大地之力。10%降低对手的特防1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de reducir un nivel la Defensa Especial al rival.

Name: Earthquake
Description (Short): Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用地震的冲击，攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。
Description (Spanish Short): El daño es doble si golpea a un Pokémon en mitad de una excavación.

Name: Echoed Voice
Description (Short): Power increases when used on consecutive turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 用回声攻击对手。如果每回合都有宝可梦接着使用该招式，威力就会提高。
Description (Spanish Short): El poder base del movimiento aumenta si es usado de manera consecutiva. Cada uso adicional incrementa en 40 el poder base, máximo 200.

Name: Eerie Impulse
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 从身体放射出怪异电波，让对手沐浴其中，100%的几率令目标特攻降低2级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja dos niveles el Ataque Especial al rival.

Name: Eerie Spell
Description (Short): Removes 3 PP from the target's last move.
Description (Chinese Short): 用强大的精神力量攻击。让对手最后使用的招式减少3PP。
Description (Spanish Short): Removes 3 PP from the target's last move.

Name: Egg Bomb
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手用力投掷大大的蛋进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Electric Terrain
Description (Short): 5 turns. Grounded: +Electric power, can't sleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内变成电气场地。地面上的宝可梦将无法睡眠。电属性的招式威力提升30%。
Description (Spanish Short): Crea un campo eléctrico durante 5 turnos. Los Pokémon en el suelo no pueden ser dormidos.

Name: Electrify
Description (Short): Changes the target's move to Electric this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 对手使出招式前，使目标进入输电状态，将目标接下来使用的招式变成电属性。
Description (Spanish Short): Si el Pokémon objetivo aún no ha realizado su movimiento en el mismo turno, dicho movimiento se vuelve de tipo Eléctrico.

Name: Electro Ball
Description (Short): More power the faster the user is than the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用电气团撞向对手。自己比对手速度越快，威力越大。
Description (Spanish Short): El poder base de este movimiento es mayor cuanto más rápido el usuario frente al rival, y varía entre 60 y 150.

Name: Electroweb
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用电网捉住对手进行攻击。100%几率令目标的速度降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel la Velocidad al rival.

Name: Embargo
Description (Short): For 5 turns, the target's item has no effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手在５回合内不能使用宝可梦携带的道具。训练家也不能给那只宝可梦使用道具。
Description (Spanish Short): Impide al Pokémon rival usar su objeto equipado, así como al jugador rival usar objetos en él, durante 5 turnos.

Name: Ember
Description (Short): 10% chance to burn the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射小型火焰进行攻击。10%几率令对手陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de quemar al rival.

Name: Encore
Description (Short): Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手接受再来一次，连续３次令目标使出目标最后使用的招式。
Description (Spanish Short): El Pokémon objetivo queda obligado a usar el último movimiento que haya usado durante 3 turnos.

Name: Endeavor
Description (Short): Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 给予伤害，使对手的ＨＰ变得和自己的ＨＰ一样。
Description (Spanish Short): Causa daño equivalente a la diferencia entre el PS actual del rival y del usuario. No aplica resistencias, pero no afecta a Fantasma.

Name: Endure
Description (Short): User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 即使受到攻击，也至少会留下１ＨＰ。连续使出则容易失败。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario resiste con vida todo ataque con al menos 1 PS. Su precisión se reduce con cada uso consecutivo.

Name: Energy Ball
Description (Short): 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 发射从自然收集的生命力量。10%的几率降低对手的特防1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de reducir un nivel la Defensa Especial al rival.

Name: Entrainment
Description (Short): The target's Ability changes to match the user's.
Description (Chinese Short): 用神奇的节奏跳舞。使对手模仿自己的动作，从而将特性变成一样。
Description (Spanish Short): El rival obtiene la habilidad del usuario hasta que sea intercambiado.

Name: Eruption
Description (Short): Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 爆发怒火攻击对手。自己的ＨＰ越少，招式的威力越小。
Description (Spanish Short): El poder de este movimiento será mayor cuanto mayor el PS del usuario. El daño será: 150 x ( PS actual / PS total ).

Name: Eternabeam
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 无极汰那变回原来的样子后，发动的最强攻击。下一回合自己将无法动弹。
Description (Spanish Short): User cannot move next turn.

Name: Expanding Force
Description (Short): User on Psychic Terrain: 1.5x power, hits foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用精神力量攻击对手。在精神场地上威力会提高50%，能对所有对手造成伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): User on Psychic Terrain: 1.5x power, hits foes.

Name: Explosion
Description (Short): Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.
Description (Chinese Short): 引发大爆炸，攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。使用后自己会陷入濒死。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario cae debilitado tras usar este movimiento. El movimiento fallará si su objetivo desaparece.

Name: Extrasensory
Description (Short): 10% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 发出看不见的神奇力量进行攻击。10%几率令对手畏缩。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de hacer retroceder al rival.

Name: Extreme Evoboost
Description (Short): Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的伊布将借助进化后伙伴们的力量，提升自身攻击、防御、特攻、特防、速度各2级。
Description (Spanish Short): Movimiento Z que sólo puede ser usado una vez por combate. Sólo puede ser utilizado por Eevee con Eeveestal Z equipado. Aumenta dos niveles el Ataque, la Defensa, el Ataque Especial, la Defensa Especial y la Velocidad al usuario.

Name: Extreme Speed
Description (Short): Nearly always goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 以迅雷不及掩耳之势猛撞向对手进行攻击。必定能够先制攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea primero.

Name: Facade
Description (Short): Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.
Description (Chinese Short): 当自己处于中毒、麻痹、灼伤状态时，向对手使出此招式的话，威力会变成２倍。
Description (Spanish Short): El poder base se duplica si el usuario está Quemado, Paralizado o Envenenado.

Name: Fairy Lock
Description (Short): Prevents all Pokemon from switching next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过封锁，下一回合幽灵系外所有的宝可梦都无法逃走。
Description (Spanish Short): Impide al rival ser intercambiado en el siguiente turno, salvo usando Relevo, Ida y Vuelta, Voltiocambio o Última Palabra, o si tiene Muda Concha o Botón Escape.

Name: Fairy Wind
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 刮起妖精之风，吹向对手进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Fake Out
Description (Short): Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.
Description (Chinese Short): 进行先制攻击，100%几率令对手畏缩。要在出场后立刻使出才能成功。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de hacer retroceder al rival. Golpea primero. Sólo puede ser utilizado con éxito el primer turno de ataque del usuario tras ser intercambiado.

Name: Fake Tears
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 装哭流泪。使对手不知所措，100%几率降低对手的特防2级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja dos niveles la Defensa Especial al rival.

Name: False Surrender
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 装作低头认错的样子，用凌乱的头发进行突刺。攻击必定会命中。
Description (Spanish Short): This move does not check accuracy.

Name: False Swipe
Description (Short): Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 对手的ＨＰ至少会留下１ＨＰ，如此般手下留情地攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Deja al rival con al menos 1 PS.

Name: Feather Dance
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Attack by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 撒出羽毛，笼罩在对手的周围。100%几率降低对手的攻击2级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja dos niveles el Ataque al rival.

Name: Feint
Description (Short): Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.
Description (Chinese Short): 能够攻击正在使用守住或看穿等招式的对手。解除其守护效果。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea aunque el rival use Protección, Detección, Vastaguardia o Anticipo ese turno, los cuales se ven anulados.

Name: Feint Attack
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 悄悄地靠近对手，趁其不备进行殴打。攻击必定会命中。
Description (Spanish Short): Siempre golpea.

Name: Fell Stinger
Description (Short): Raises user's Attack by 3 if this KOes the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果使用此招式击倒目标，攻击会提升3级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta dos niveles el Ataque al usuario cuando este ataque debilita a un Pokémon rival.

Name: Fiery Dance
Description (Short): 50% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 让火焰覆盖全身，振翅攻击对手。50%几率提高自己的特攻1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 50% de aumentar un nivel el Ataque Especial al usuario.

Name: Fiery Wrath
Description (Short): 20% chance to flinch the foe(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 将愤怒转化为火焰般的气场进行攻击。20%几率使对手畏缩。
Description (Spanish Short): 20% chance to flinch the foe(s).

Name: Final Gambit
Description (Short): Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.
Description (Chinese Short): 拼命攻击对手。自身陷入濒死，给予对手和自己目前ＨＰ等量的伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario cae debilitado. Provoca daño al Pokémon objetivo equivalente al PS restante del usuario.

Name: Fire Blast
Description (Short): 10% chance to burn the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用大字形状的火焰烧尽对手。10%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de quemar al rival.

Name: Fire Fang
Description (Short): 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.
Description (Chinese Short): 用覆盖着火焰的牙齿咬住对手。10%几率使对手畏缩或陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de quemar al rival y 10% de hacer retroceder al rival. Ambos efectos son independientes y pueden ocurrir a la vez.

Name: Fire Lash
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用燃烧的鞭子抽打对手。100%几率降低对手防御1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de reducir un nivel la Defensa al rival.

Name: Fire Pledge
Description (Short): Use with Grass or Water Pledge for added effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用火柱进行攻击。如果与水之誓约或草之誓约混合使用，效果更佳。
Description (Spanish Short): Se combina con Voto Agua y con Voto Planta.

Name: Fire Punch
Description (Short): 10% chance to burn the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用充满火焰的拳头攻击对手。10%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de quemar al rival.

Name: Fire Spin
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手困在激烈的火焰旋涡中，100%几率使目标束缚４~５回合。
Description (Spanish Short): El Pokémon rival permanece atrapado de 4 a 5 turnos, recibiendo un daño del 12.5% del PS cada turno.

Name: First Impression
Description (Short): Hits first. First turn out only.
Description (Chinese Short): 威力很高的招式，但只有在出场战斗时，立刻使出才能成功。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea primero. Sólo puede ser utilizado con éxito el primer turno de ataque del usuario tras ser intercambiado.

Name: Fishious Rend
Description (Short): Power doubles if user moves before the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用坚硬的腮咬住对手。如果比对手先出手攻击，招式的威力会变成２倍。
Description (Spanish Short): Power doubles if user moves before the target.

Name: Fissure
Description (Short): OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手掉落于地裂的裂缝中进行攻击。只要命中就会一击濒死。
Description (Spanish Short): Puede debilitar al Pokémon rival de un solo golpe.

Name: Flail
Description (Short): More power the less HP the user has left.
Description (Chinese Short): 抓狂般乱打进行攻击。自己的ＨＰ越少，招式的威力越大。
Description (Spanish Short): El poder base de este movimiento es mayor cuanto menor el PS restante del usuario.

Name: Flame Burst
Description (Short): Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果击中，爆裂的火焰会攻击到对手。爆裂出的火焰还会飞溅到旁边的对手。
Description (Spanish Short): Los Pokémon cercanos al Pokémon objetivo pierden un 6.25% de su PS máximo.

Name: Flame Charge
Description (Short): 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 让火焰覆盖全身，攻击对手。100%几率提高自己的速度1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel la Velocidad al usuario.

Name: Flame Wheel
Description (Short): 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.
Description (Chinese Short): 让火焰覆盖全身，猛撞向对手进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de quemar al rival. Puede ser utilizado incluso cuando el Pokémon está congelado, curando automáticamente la congelación.

Name: Flamethrower
Description (Short): 10% chance to burn the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射烈焰进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de quemar al rival.

Name: Flare Blitz
Description (Short): Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.
Description (Chinese Short): 让火焰覆盖全身猛撞向对手。自己也会受到33%的伤害。有10%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de quemar al rival. Provoca un daño de retroceso del 33% del daño provocado al Pokémon rival.

Name: Flash
Description (Short): Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出耀眼光芒，100%几率降低对手的命中率1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel la Precisión al rival.

Name: Flash Cannon
Description (Short): 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将身体的光芒聚集在一点释放出去。10%几率降低对手的特防1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de reducir un nivel la Defensa Especial al rival.

Name: Flatter
Description (Short): Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.
Description (Chinese Short): 吹捧对手，使其混乱。同时还会提高对手的特攻1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca Confusión. Aumenta un nivel el Ataque Especial al rival.

Name: Fleur Cannon
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 放出强力光束后，自己的特攻会降低2级。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de reducir dos niveles el Ataque Especial al usuario.

Name: Fling
Description (Short): Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.
Description (Chinese Short): 快速投掷携带的道具进行攻击。根据道具不同，威力和效果会改变。
Description (Spanish Short): Lanza el objeto equipado al rival. El efecto y daño causado depende del objeto lanzado. El objeto se puede recuperar con Reciclaje.

Name: Flip Turn
Description (Short): User switches out after damaging the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 在攻击之后急速返回，和后备宝可梦进行替换。
Description (Spanish Short): User switches out after damaging the target.

Name: Floaty Fall
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 轻飘飘地浮起来后，再猛地俯冲下去进行攻击。有30%几率会使对手畏缩。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de hacer retroceder al rival.

Name: Floral Healing
Description (Short): Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 回复目标最大ＨＰ的一半。在青草场地时，回复目标2/3的HP。
Description (Spanish Short): El Pokémon objetivo recupera 66.6% PS en Campo de Hierba, y 50% PS si no hay campo o en Campo Eléctrico, Campo Psíquico o Campo de Niebla.

Name: Flower Shield
Description (Short): Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.
Description (Chinese Short): 使用神奇的力量提高在场的所有草属性宝可梦的防御提高1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel la Defensa a todos los Pokémon de tipo Planta en combate.

Name: Fly
Description (Short): Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 第１回合飞上天空，第２回合攻击对手。
Description (Spanish Short): Precisa un turno de preparación en el cielo, en que sólo puede ser golpeado por Tornado, Remolino, Trueno, Ciclón, Gancho Alto, Antiaéreo y Vendaval.

Name: Flying Press
Description (Short): Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.
Description (Chinese Short): 从空中俯冲向对手。此招式同时带有格斗属性和飞行属性。
Description (Spanish Short): Este ataque cuenta con las efectividades combinadas de los tipos Lucha y Volador.

Name: Focus Blast
Description (Short): 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 提高气势，释放出全部力量。10%几率降低对手的特防1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de reducir un nivel la Defensa Especial al rival.

Name: Focus Energy
Description (Short): Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 深深地吸口气，集中精神。使自身进入易中要害状态，处于易中要害状态的宝可梦击中要害概率提升2级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta la probabilidad de que el Pokémon haga Golpe Crítico.

Name: Focus Punch
Description (Short): Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.
Description (Chinese Short): 集中精神出拳。在招式使出前若受到攻击则会失败。
Description (Spanish Short): Ataca último si no es golpeado.

Name: Follow Me
Description (Short): The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.
Description (Chinese Short): 引起对手的注意，将对手的攻击全部转移到自己身上。
Description (Spanish Short): En batallas múltiples, los ataques que usen los Pokémon rivales ese turno golpearán al usuario, ignorando la elección de su entrenador. No afecta a los ataques varios objetivos.

Name: Force Palm
Description (Short): 30% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手的身体发出冲击波进行攻击。30%几率会让对手陷入麻痹状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de paralizar al rival.

Name: Foresight
Description (Short): Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.
Description (Chinese Short): 对幽灵属性宝可梦没有效果的招式以及闪避率高的对手，使用后变得能够打中。
Description (Spanish Short): Hasta el intercambio o derrota del rival, su Evasión y tu Precisión no pueden ser modificados. Si el rival es de tipo Fantasma, no es inmune a ataques de tipo Normal o Lucha.

Name: Forest's Curse
Description (Short): Adds Grass to the target's type(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手施加森林诅咒。中了诅咒的对手会被追加草属性。
Description (Spanish Short): Adds Grass to the target's type(s).

Name: Foul Play
Description (Short): Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用对手的力量进行攻击。正和自己战斗的对手，其攻击越高，伤害越大。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea al rival utilizando su propio stat de Ataque.

Name: Freeze-Dry
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.
Description (Chinese Short): 急剧冷冻对手，有10%几率让对手陷入冰冻状态。对于水属性宝可梦造成效果绝佳。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de congelar al rival. Es muy efectivo contra Pokémon de tipo Agua.

Name: Freeze Shock
Description (Short): Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. 30% paralyze.
Description (Chinese Short): 用覆盖着电流的冰块，在第２回合撞向对手。有30%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de paralizar al rival. Se prepara el primer turno para atacar en el segundo.

Name: Freezing Glare
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 从双眼发射精神力量进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入冰冻状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% chance to freeze the target.

Name: Freezy Frost
Description (Short): Eliminates all stat changes.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用冰冷的黑雾结晶进行攻击。使全体宝可梦的能力变回原点。
Description (Spanish Short): Elimina todos los modificadores de stats de todos los Pokémon.

Name: Frenzy Plant
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用大树摔打对手进行攻击。下一回合自己将无法动弹。
Description (Spanish Short): Impide al usuario usar un movimiento o ser intercambiado en el siguiente turno.

Name: Frost Breath
Description (Short): Always results in a critical hit.
Description (Chinese Short): 将冰冷的气息吹向对手进行攻击。必定会击中要害。
Description (Spanish Short): Siempre provoca un Golpe Crítico salvo que una habilidad o efecto lo impida.

Name: Frustration
Description (Short): Max 102 power at minimum Happiness.
Description (Chinese Short): 为了发泄不满而全力攻击对手。亲密度越低，威力越大。
Description (Spanish Short): Su poder base depende de la Infelicidad del Pokémon, entre 0 y 102.

Name: Fury Attack
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用角或喙刺向对手进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea de 2 a 5 veces seguidas.

Name: Fury Cutter
Description (Short): Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.
Description (Chinese Short): 用镰刀或爪子等切斩对手进行攻击。连续击中，威力就会提高。
Description (Spanish Short): Por cada turno que el ataque sea usado y acierte, su poder base se dobla, pero sólo durante 4 turnos. Puedes usar otros movimientos entre medias sin perder el bonus.

Name: Fury Swipes
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用爪子或镰刀等抓对手进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea de 2 a 5 veces seguidas.

Name: Fusion Bolt
Description (Short): Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 释放出巨大的闪电。受到巨大的火焰影响时，招式威力翻倍。
Description (Spanish Short): El poder base de este movimiento se duplica si otro Pokémon utiliza Llama Fusión o Llama Azul inmediatamente antes en el mismo turno.

Name: Fusion Flare
Description (Short): Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 释放出巨大的火焰。受到巨大的闪电影响时，招式威力会提高。
Description (Spanish Short): El poder base de este movimiento se duplica si otro Pokémon utiliza Rayo Fusión o Ataque Fulgor inmediatamente antes en el mismo turno.

Name: Future Sight
Description (Short): Hits two turns after being used.
Description (Chinese Short): 在使用招式２回合后，向对手发送一团念力进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Este ataque golpeará al objetivo al final del segundo turno tras su uso. Mientras, se pueden usar otros ataques y tanto el usuario como el rival pueden ser intercambiados.

Name: Gastro Acid
Description (Short): Nullifies the target's Ability.
Description (Chinese Short): 将胃液吐向对手的身体。沾上的胃液会消除对手的特性效果。
Description (Spanish Short): Cancela el efecto de la habilidad del rival mientras no sea intercambiado.

Name: Gear Grind
Description (Short): Hits 2 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手投掷钢铁齿轮进行攻击。连续２次给予伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea 2 veces seguidas.

Name: Gear Up
Description (Short): Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 启动齿轮，令己方提高特性为正电和负电的宝可梦的攻击和特攻各1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel el Ataque y el Ataque Especial al usuario y sus aliados con la habilidad Más o Menos.

Name: Genesis Supernova
Description (Short): Summons Psychic Terrain.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的梦幻将全力攻击对手。脚下会变成精神场地。
Description (Spanish Short): Movimiento Z que sólo puede ser usado una vez por combate. Sólo puede ser utilizado por Mew con Mewstal Z equipado. Crea un Campo Psíquico durante 5 turnos.

Name: Geomancy
Description (Short): Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 第１回合吸收能量，第２回合提高特攻、特防和速度各2级。
Description (Spanish Short): Se prepara en el primer turno para aumentar dos niveles su Ataque Especial, su Defensa Especial y su Velocidad en el segundo.

Name: Giga Drain
Description (Short): User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 吸取对手的养分进行攻击。可以回复对手所受伤害的一半ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera PS equivalente a la mitad del daño causado.

Name: Giga Impact
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出自己浑身力量突击对手。下一回合自己将无法动弹。
Description (Spanish Short): Impide al usuario usar un movimiento o ser intercambiado en el siguiente turno.

Name: Gigavolt Havoc
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量将蓄积的强大电流全力撞向对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。
Description (Spanish Short): Movimiento Z que sólo puede ser usado una vez por combate. Sólo puede ser utilizado por un Pokémon con el Cristal Z correspondiente. Su potencia depende del movimiento original.

Name: Glacial Lance
Description (Short): No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手投掷掀起暴风雪的冰矛进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Name: Glaciate
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将冰冻的冷气吹向对手进行攻击。100%几率降低对手的速度1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel la Velocidad al rival.

Name: Glare
Description (Short): Paralyzes the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用腹部的花纹使对手害怕，从而让其陷入麻痹状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca Parálisis.

Name: Glitzy Glow
Description (Short): Summons Light Screen.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用念力强攻，粉碎对方信心。制造一道能减弱对手特殊攻击的神奇墙壁。
Description (Spanish Short): Reduce el daño provocado a tu Pokémon por ataques especiales del rival en un 50% (33% en 2vs2) durante 5 turnos.

Name: G-Max Befuddle
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: slp or psn or par.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的巴大蝶使出的虫属性攻击。会让对手陷入中毒、麻痹或睡眠状态中的一种。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: slp or psn or par.

Name: G-Max Cannonade
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的水箭龟使出的水属性攻击。在４回合内每回合给予对手损失最大HP1/6的伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

Name: G-Max Centiferno
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的焚焰蚣使出的火属性攻击。可在４～５回合内将对手困在火焰中。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.

Name: G-Max Chi Strike
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: Crit Ratio +1.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的怪力使出的格斗属性攻击。自身击中要害等级提升1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Allies: Crit Ratio +1.

Name: G-Max Cuddle
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: infatuated.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的伊布使出的一般属性攻击。会让性别相对的对手陷入着迷状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: infatuated.

Name: G-Max Depletion
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: last move -2 PP.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的铝钢龙使出的龙属性攻击。对手最后使用的招式的ＰＰ减2。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: last move -2 PP.

Name: G-Max Drum Solo
Description (Short): Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的轰擂金刚猩使出的草属性攻击。不会受到对手特性的干扰。
Description (Spanish Short): Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.

Name: G-Max Finale
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1/6 max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的霜奶仙使出的妖精属性攻击。可回复我方的所有宝可梦当前最大1/6的ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1/6 max HP.

Name: G-Max Fireball
Description (Short): Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的闪焰王牌使出的火属性攻击。不会受到对手特性的干扰。
Description (Spanish Short): Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.

Name: G-Max Foam Burst
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -2 Speed.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的巨钳蟹使出的水属性攻击。100%几率令对手全部宝可梦速度降低2级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -2 Speed.

Name: G-Max Gold Rush
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: confused.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的喵喵使出的一般属性攻击。会让对手全员陷入混乱状态，并可获得金钱。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: confused.

Name: G-Max Gravitas
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Gravity.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的以欧路普使出的超能力属性攻击。在５回合内重力会产生变化，包括使用技能的本回合。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Starts Gravity.

Name: G-Max Hydrosnipe
Description (Short): Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的千面避役使出的水属性攻击。不会受到对手特性的干扰。
Description (Spanish Short): Stronger than other Max Moves. Ignores abilities.

Name: G-Max Malodor
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: poisoned.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的灰尘山使出的毒属性攻击。会让对手陷入中毒状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: poisoned.

Name: G-Max Meltdown
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: Tormented.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的美录梅塔使出的钢属性攻击。会让对手所有宝可梦2回合无法连续使出相同的招式。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: Tormented.

Name: G-Max One Blow
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Breaks all protection.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的武道熊师使出的恶属性攻击。是可以无视极巨防壁的一击。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Breaks all protection.

Name: G-Max Rapid Flow
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Breaks all protection.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的武道熊师使出的水属性攻击。是可以无视极巨防壁的连击。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Breaks all protection.

Name: G-Max Replenish
Description (Short): Base move affects power. 50% restores Berries.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的卡比兽使出的一般属性攻击。50%的几率获得已经使用过的树果。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. 50% restores Berries.

Name: G-Max Resonance
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: Aurora Veil.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的拉普拉斯使出的冰属性攻击。可在５回合内受到的伤害减半。场上存在其他己方宝可梦则只降低1/3
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Allies: Aurora Veil.

Name: G-Max Sandblast
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的沙螺蟒使出的地面属性攻击。使目标陷入束缚状态持续４～５回合。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.

Name: G-Max Smite
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: confused.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的布莉姆温使出的妖精属性攻击。会让对手陷入混乱状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: confused.

Name: G-Max Snooze
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Target: 50% Yawn.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的长毛巨魔使出的恶属性攻击。有50%概率会通过打大哈欠让目标陷入瞌睡状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Target: 50% Yawn.

Name: G-Max Steelsurge
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: Steel hazard.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的大王铜象使出的钢属性攻击。向对手场地撒下尖锐的刺，使交换上场的宝可梦受到满HP1/8的伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: Steel hazard.

Name: G-Max Stonesurge
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: Stealth Rock.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的暴噬龟使出的水属性攻击。向对手场地撒下尖锐的岩石，使交换上场的宝可梦受到满HP1/8的伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: Stealth Rock.

Name: G-Max Stun Shock
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: psn or par.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的颤弦蝾螈使出的电属性攻击。会让对手陷入中毒或麻痹状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: psn or par.

Name: G-Max Sweetness
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: status cured.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的丰蜜龙使出的草属性攻击。会治愈我方的异常状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Allies: status cured.

Name: G-Max Tartness
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 evasiveness.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的苹裹龙使出的草属性攻击。会降低对手的闪避率。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 evasiveness.

Name: G-Max Terror
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: trapped.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的耿鬼使出的幽灵属性攻击。会踩住对手的影子，让其无法被替换。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: trapped.

Name: G-Max Vine Lash
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的妙蛙花使出的草属性攻击。会在回合结束对草属性以外的宝可梦损失最大HP的1/6，持续4回合。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

Name: G-Max Volcalith
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的巨炭山使出的岩石属性攻击。会在回合结束对岩石属性以外的宝可梦损失最大HP的1/6，持续4回合。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

Name: G-Max Volt Crash
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: paralyzed.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的皮卡丘使出的电属性攻击。会让对手所有宝可梦陷入麻痹状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: paralyzed.

Name: G-Max Wildfire
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的喷火龙使出的火属性攻击。会在回合结束对火属性以外的宝可梦损失最大HP的1/6，持续4回合。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

Name: G-Max Wind Rage
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Ends Terrain, hazards.
Description (Chinese Short): 超极巨化的钢铠鸦使出的飞行属性攻击。可消除反射壁、光墙、撒菱和场地型状态等的效果。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Ends Terrain, hazards.

Name: Grass Knot
Description (Short): More power the heavier the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用草缠住并绊倒对手。对手越重，威力越大。
Description (Spanish Short): Este movimiento tiene un poder base variable entre 20 y 120, en función del peso del Pokémon rival.

Name: Grass Pledge
Description (Short): Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用草柱进行攻击。和火之誓约或水之誓约混合使用，效果更佳。
Description (Spanish Short): Se combina con Voto Agua y con Voto Fuego.

Name: Grass Whistle
Description (Short): Causes the target to fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手听舒适的笛声，从而陷入睡眠状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca Sueño.

Name: Grassy Glide
Description (Short): User on Grassy Terrain: +1 priority.
Description (Chinese Short): 仿佛在地面上滑行般地攻击对手。在地面上的宝可梦，必定能够先制攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): User on Grassy Terrain: +1 priority.

Name: Grassy Terrain
Description (Short): 5 turns. Grounded: +Grass power, +1/16 max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内变成青草场地。地面上的宝可梦每回合都能回复少许HP。草属性的招式威力还会提高30%。
Description (Spanish Short): Crea un campo de hierba durante 5 turnos. Los Pokémon en el suelo recuperan un 6.25% de su PS máximo al final de cada turno, y el poder de los ataques de tipo Planta aumenta un 50%.

Name: Grav Apple
Description (Short): Target: 100% -1 Def. During Gravity: 1.5x power.
Description (Chinese Short): 从高处落下苹果，给予对手伤害。100%几率降低对手防御1级。处于重力状态威力提升50%。
Description (Spanish Short): Target: 100% -1 Def. During Gravity: 1.5x power.

Name: Gravity
Description (Short): 5 turns: no Ground immunities, 1.67x accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内，飘浮特性和飞行属性的宝可梦会被地面属性的招式击中。飞向空中的招式也将无法使用。
Description (Spanish Short): Por 5 turnos se anula la inmunidad de Levitación, voladores y Levitón al tipo Tierra, Trampa Arena, Púas Tóxicas y Púas. La Evasión de todos los Pokémon baja dos niveles.

Name: Growl
Description (Short): Lowers the foe(s) Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手听可爱的叫声，引开注意力使其疏忽，降低目标攻击1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel el Ataque al rival.

Name: Growth
Description (Short): Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.
Description (Chinese Short): 让身体一下子长大，100%几率提高自身攻击和特攻各1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel el Ataque y el Ataque Especial al usuario. En Día Soleado el aumento es de dos niveles.

Name: Grudge
Description (Short): If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.
Description (Chinese Short): 因对手的招式而陷入濒死时给对手施加怨念，让该招式的ＰＰ变成０。
Description (Spanish Short): Si el rival debilita al usuario con su siguiente movimiento, los PP de ese movimiento se reducirán a cero.

Name: Guardian of Alola
Description (Short): Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量得到阿罗拉之力的土地神宝可梦将全力进行攻击。给予对手剩余3/4HP的伤害。攻击必定会命中。对手使用防住类招式则造成对手剩余3/16HP的伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Movimiento Z que sólo puede ser usado una vez por combate. Sólo puede ser utilizado por Tapu Koko, Tapu Lele, Tapu Fini o Tapu Bulu con Tapistal Z equipado. Causa un daño equivalente al 75% del PS que le queda al Pokémon rival.

Name: Guard Split
Description (Short): Averages Defense and Sp. Def stats with target.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用超能力将自己和对手的防御和特防相加，再进行平分。
Description (Spanish Short): Suma los stats de Defensa y Defensa Especial del usuario con los del Pokémon objetivo, otorgando la mitad a cada uno.

Name: Guard Swap
Description (Short): Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用超能力互换自己和对手的防御以及特防的能力变化。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario intercambia los modificadores de Defensa y Defensa Especial con el rival.

Name: Guillotine
Description (Short): OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
Description (Chinese Short): 用大钳子或剪刀等夹断对手进行攻击。只要命中就会一击濒死。
Description (Spanish Short): Puede debilitar al Pokémon rival de un solo golpe.

Name: Gunk Shot
Description (Short): 30% chance to poison the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用肮脏的垃圾撞向对手进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入中毒状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de envenenar al rival.

Name: Gust
Description (Short): Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.
Description (Chinese Short): 用翅膀将刮起的狂风袭向对手进行攻击，目标处于飞翔状态威力翻倍。可击中飞翔状态宝可梦。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea a Pokémon en mitad de un Vuelo, Bote o Caída Libre con el doble de poder base.

Name: Gyro Ball
Description (Short): More power the slower the user than the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 让身体高速旋转并撞击对手。速度比对手越慢，威力越大。
Description (Spanish Short): El poder es mayor cuanto más lento el usuario frente al rival. El daño será: 1 + (Vel.Rival / Vel.Usuario) x 25 (incluye modificadores de Velocidad, máx. 150).

Name: Hail
Description (Short): For 5 turns, hail crashes down.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内一直降冰雹，除冰属性的宝可梦以外，给予全体宝可梦伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca Granizo.

Name: Hammer Arm
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 挥舞强力而沉重的拳头，给予对手伤害。令使用者的速度降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel la Velocidad al usuario.

Name: Happy Hour
Description (Short): No competitive use.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果使用欢乐时光，战斗后得到的钱会翻倍。
Description (Spanish Short): Duplica el dinero ganado tras batallas contra entrenadores del juego.

Name: Harden
Description (Short): Raises the user's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 全身使劲，让身体变硬，提高使用者的防御1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel la Defensa al usuario.

Name: Haze
Description (Short): Eliminates all stat changes.
Description (Chinese Short): 升起黑雾，将正在场上战斗的全体宝可梦的能力变回原点。
Description (Spanish Short): Elimina todos los modificadores de stats de todos los Pokémon.

Name: Headbutt
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 将头伸出，笔直地扑向对手进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de hacer retroceder al rival.

Name: Head Charge
Description (Short): Has 1/4 recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 用厉害的爆炸头猛撞向对手进行攻击。自己也会受到造成伤害的25%的伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca un daño de retroceso del 25% del daño provocado al Pokémon rival.

Name: Head Smash
Description (Short): Has 1/2 recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 拼命使出浑身力气，向对手进行头锤攻击。自己也会受到造成伤害的50%的伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca un daño de retroceso del 50% del daño provocado al Pokémon rival.

Name: Heal Bell
Description (Short): Cures the user's party of all status conditions.
Description (Chinese Short): 让同伴听舒适的铃音，从而治愈我方全员的异常状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Cura cualquier problema de estado de cualquier miembro de tu equipo.

Name: Heal Block
Description (Short): For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内无法通过招式、特性或携带的道具来回复ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): El rival no puede recuperar PS en 5 turnos, salvo mediante Divide Dolor u objetos.

Name: Healing Wish
Description (Short): User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.
Description (Chinese Short): 虽然自己陷入濒死，但可以治愈后备上场的宝可梦的异常状态以及所有ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario cae debilitado, y el siguiente Pokémon recupera todo su PS y se ve curado de cambios de estado.

Name: Heal Order
Description (Short): Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 召唤手下疗伤。回复自己最大ＨＰ的一半。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera el 50% de su PS máximo.

Name: Heal Pulse
Description (Short): Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 放出治愈波动，从而回复对手最大ＨＰ的一半。
Description (Spanish Short): El Pokémon objetivo recupera el 50% de su PS máximo.

Name: Heart Stamp
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 以可爱的动作使对手疏忽，乘机给出强烈的一击。30%几率使对手畏缩。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de hacer retroceder al rival.

Name: Heart Swap
Description (Short): Swaps all stat changes with target.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用超能力互换自己和对手之间的能力变化。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario intercambia los modificadores de todos los stats con el rival.

Name: Heat Crash
Description (Short): More power the heavier the user than the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用燃烧的身体撞向对手进行攻击。自己比对手越重，威力越大
Description (Spanish Short): Este movimiento tiene un poder base variable en función del peso del usuario y del Pokémon rival.

Name: Heat Wave
Description (Short): 10% chance to burn the foe(s).
Description (Chinese Short): 将炎热的气息吹向对手进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de quemar al rival.

Name: Heavy Slam
Description (Short): More power the heavier the user than the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用沉重的身体撞向对手进行攻击。自己比对手越重，威力越大。
Description (Spanish Short): Este movimiento tiene un poder base variable en función del peso del usuario y del Pokémon rival.

Name: Helping Hand
Description (Short): One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 帮助伙伴。被帮助的宝可梦，其招式威力在本回合结束前提升50%。
Description (Spanish Short): En batallas múltiples, el ataque que use su compañero ese turno verá aumentado su poder base en un 50%.

Name: Hex
Description (Short): Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.
Description (Chinese Short): 接二连三地进行攻击。攻击处于异常状态的对手威力翻倍。
Description (Spanish Short): Si el Pokémon objetivo sufre un cambio de estado, su poder base se dobla.

Name: Hidden Power
Description (Chinese Short): 招式的属性会随着使用此招式的宝可梦而改变。
Description (Spanish Short): Este movimiento tiene un tipo variable y un poder base variable entre 30 y 70, dependiendo de los IV′s del usuario.

Name: High Horsepower
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出全身力量，猛攻对手。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: High Jump Kick
Description (Short): User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.
Description (Chinese Short): 跳起后用膝盖撞对手进行攻击。若没有命中自身损失最大HP一半HP。
Description (Spanish Short): Si el ataque falla, el usuario recibe un daño equivalente al 50% de su PS máximo.

Name: Hold Back
Description (Short): Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 在攻击的时候手下留情，从而使对手的ＨＰ至少会留下１ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): Deja al rival con al menos 1 PS.

Name: Hold Hands
Description (Short): No competitive use.
Description (Chinese Short): 我方宝可梦之间牵手。能带来非常幸福的心情。
Description (Spanish Short): El Pokémon baila con su aliado en un combate múltiple.

Name: Hone Claws
Description (Short): Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将爪子磨得更加锋利。提高自己的攻击和命中率各1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel el Ataque y la Precisión al usuario.

Name: Horn Attack
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用尖锐的角攻击对手。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Horn Drill
Description (Short): OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.
Description (Chinese Short): 用旋转的角刺入对手进行攻击。只要命中就会一击濒死。
Description (Spanish Short): Puede debilitar al Pokémon rival de un solo golpe.

Name: Horn Leech
Description (Short): User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 将角刺入，吸取对手的养分。可以回复给予对手伤害的一半ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera PS equivalente a la mitad del daño causado.

Name: Howl
Description (Short): Raises the user's and ally's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 大声吼叫提高气势，从而提高自己的攻击1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel el Ataque al usuario.

Name: Hurricane
Description (Short): 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.
Description (Chinese Short): 用强烈的风席卷对手进行攻击。30%几率使对手混乱。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de confundir al rival. Golpea a Pokémon en mitad de un Vuelo, Bote o Caída Libre. En Llovizna no falla. En Día Soleado tiene 50% de precisión.

Name: Hydro Cannon
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手喷射水炮进行攻击。下一回合自己将无法动弹。
Description (Spanish Short): Impide al usuario usar un movimiento o ser intercambiado en el siguiente turno.

Name: Hydro Pump
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手猛烈地喷射大量水流进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Hydro Vortex
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量制造大大的潮旋，全力吞没对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。
Description (Spanish Short): Movimiento Z que sólo puede ser usado una vez por combate. Sólo puede ser utilizado por un Pokémon con el Cristal Z correspondiente. Su potencia depende del movimiento original.

Name: Hyper Beam
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射强烈的光线进行攻击。下一回合自己将无法动弹。
Description (Spanish Short): Impide al usuario usar un movimiento o ser intercambiado en el siguiente turno.

Name: Hyper Fang
Description (Short): 10% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用锋利的门牙牢牢地咬住对手进行攻击。20%几率使对手畏缩。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de hacer retroceder al rival.

Name: Hyperspace Fury
Description (Short): Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用许多手臂，无视对手的守住或看穿等招式进行连续攻击，使用者防御会降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea aunque el rival use Protección, Detección, Vastaguardia o Anticipo ese turno. Baja un nivel la Defensa al usuario.

Name: Hyperspace Hole
Description (Short): Breaks the target's protection for this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过异次元洞，突然出现在对手的侧面进行攻击。还可以无视守住和看穿等招式。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea aunque el rival use Protección, Detección, Vastaguardia o Anticipo ese turno.

Name: Hyper Voice
Description (Short): No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 给予对手又吵又响的巨大震动进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Hypnosis
Description (Short): Causes the target to fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 施以诱导睡意的暗示，让对手陷入睡眠状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca Sueño.

Name: Ice Ball
Description (Short): Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内强制攻击对手。招式每次击中，威力就会提高。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario debe usar este movimiento por hasta 5 turnos (mientras no falle). Por cada turno que use el ataque, su poder base se dobla.

Name: Ice Beam
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射冰冻光束进行攻击。10%几率让对手陷入冰冻状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de congelar al rival.

Name: Ice Burn
Description (Short): Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. 30% burn.
Description (Chinese Short): 用能够冻结一切的强烈冷气，在第２回合包裹住对手。30%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de quemar al rival. Se prepara el primer turno para atacar en el segundo.

Name: Ice Fang
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.
Description (Chinese Short): 用藏有冷气的牙齿咬住对手。10%几率使对手畏缩或陷入冰冻状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de congelar al rival y 10% de hacer retroceder al rival. Ambos efectos son independientes y pueden ocurrir a la vez.

Name: Ice Hammer
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 挥舞强力而沉重的拳头，给予对手伤害。令使用者的速度降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel la Velocidad al usuario.

Name: Ice Punch
Description (Short): 10% chance to freeze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用充满寒气的拳头攻击对手。10%几率让对手陷入冰冻状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de congelar al rival.

Name: Ice Shard
Description (Short): Usually goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 瞬间制作冰块，快速地扔向对手。必定能够先制攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea primero.

Name: Icicle Crash
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用大冰柱激烈地撞向对手进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de hacer retroceder al rival.

Name: Icicle Spear
Description (Short): Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手发射锋利的冰柱进行攻击。连续攻击２～５次。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea de 2 a 5 veces seguidas.

Name: Icy Wind
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 将结冰的冷气吹向对手进行攻击。100%几率降低目标的速度1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de reducir un nivel la Velocidad al rival.

Name: Imprison
Description (Short): No foe can use any move known by the user.
Description (Chinese Short): 如果对手有和自己相同的招式，那么只有对手无法使用该招式。
Description (Spanish Short): Mientras el usuario permanezca en batalla, los rivales no pueden usar movimientos que también conozca el usuario (incluso si los aprende en batalla).

Name: Incinerate
Description (Short): Destroys the foe(s) Berry/Gem.
Description (Chinese Short): 用火焰攻击对手。对手携带树果或宝石时，会烧掉，使其不能使用。
Description (Spanish Short): Quema la Baya del Pokémon objetivo y la hace inservible.

Name: Inferno
Description (Short): 100% chance to burn the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用烈焰包裹住对手进行攻击。100%几率让对手陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de quemar al rival.

Name: Inferno Overdrive
Description (Short): Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量喷出熊熊烈火，全力撞向对手。威力会根据原来的招式而改变。
Description (Spanish Short): Movimiento Z que sólo puede ser usado una vez por combate. Sólo puede ser utilizado por un Pokémon con el Cristal Z correspondiente. Su potencia depende del movimiento original.

Name: Infestation
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 在４～５回合内死缠烂打地进行攻击。在此期间对手将无法逃走。
Description (Spanish Short): El Pokémon rival permanece atrapado de 4 a 5 turnos, recibiendo un daño del 12.5% del PS cada turno.

Name: Ingrain
Description (Short): Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 在大地上扎根，每回合回复自己满HP的1/16ＨＰ。因为扎根了，所以不能替换宝可梦。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera un 6.25% de su PS máximo al final de cada turno, pero no puede ser intercambiado. Anula la inmunidad a Tierra de voladores y levitadores.

Name: Instruct
Description (Short): The target immediately uses its last used move.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手下达指示，让其再次使出刚才的招式。
Description (Spanish Short): El Pokémon objetivo ejecuta inmediatamente el último movimiento que haya usado en combate.

Name: Ion Deluge
Description (Short): Normal moves become Electric type this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 将带电粒子扩散开来，使一般属性的招式变成电属性。
Description (Spanish Short): Los movimientos de tipo Normal pasan a ser de tipo Eléctrico.

Name: Iron Defense
Description (Short): Raises the user's Defense by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 将皮肤变得坚硬如铁，从而提高自己的防御2级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta dos niveles la Defensa al usuario.

Name: Iron Head
Description (Short): 30% chance to flinch the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用钢铁般坚硬的头部进行攻击。30%几率使对手畏缩。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de hacer retroceder al rival.

Name: Iron Tail
Description (Short): 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 使用坚硬的尾巴摔打对手进行攻击。30%几率降低对手的防御1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de reducir un nivel la Defensa al rival.

Name: Jaw Lock
Description (Short): Prevents both user and target from switching out.
Description (Chinese Short): 使双方直到一方濒死为止无法替换宝可梦。其中一方退场则可以解除效果。
Description (Spanish Short): Prevents both user and target from switching out.

Name: Judgment
Description (Short): Type varies based on the held Plate.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手放出无数的光弹。属性会根据自己携带的石板不同而改变。
Description (Spanish Short): El tipo del ataque depende de la Tabla equipada.

Name: Jump Kick
Description (Short): User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出高高的腾空踢攻击对手。若没有命中自身损失最大HP的一半HP。
Description (Spanish Short): Si el ataque falla, el usuario recibe un daño equivalente al 50% de su PS máximo.

Name: Jungle Healing
Description (Short): User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.
Description (Chinese Short): 与丛林融为一体，回复自己和场上同伴的1/4ＨＰ并治愈所有异常状态。
Description (Spanish Short): User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

Name: Karate Chop
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 用锋利的手刀劈向对手进行攻击。容易击中要害。
Description (Spanish Short): Alta probabilidad de Golpe Crítico.

Name: Kinesis
Description (Short): Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 折弯汤匙引开注意，从而降低对手的命中率1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel la Precisión al rival.

Name: King's Shield
Description (Short): Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.
Description (Chinese Short): 防住对手攻击的同时，自己变为防御姿态。降低所接触到的对手的攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.

Name: Knock Off
Description (Short): 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.
Description (Chinese Short): 拍落对手的持有物，直到战斗结束都不能使用。对手携带道具时伤害提升50%。
Description (Spanish Short): El rival pierde el objeto que pudiera tener equipado durante el resto de la batalla, salvo que tenga Viscosidad o Multitipo.

Name: Land's Wrath
Description (Short): No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.
Description (Chinese Short): 聚集大地的力量，将此力量集中攻击对手，并给予伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Name: Laser Focus
Description (Short): Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.
Description (Chinese Short): 集中精神，下次攻击必定会击中要害。
Description (Spanish Short): Garantiza que el ataque que realice el usuario el siguiente turno sea Golpe Crítico.

Name: Lash Out
Description (Short): 2x power if the user had a stat lowered this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击对手以发泄对其感到的恼怒情绪。如果在该回合内自身能力遭到降低，招式的威力会变成２倍。
Description (Spanish Short): 2x power if the user had a stat lowered this turn.

Name: Last Resort
Description (Short): Fails unless each known move has been used.
Description (Chinese Short): 当战斗中已学会的招式全部使用过后，才能开始使出珍藏的招式。
Description (Spanish Short): Falla mientras el usuario no haya usado el resto de sus movimientos desde que salió a la batalla (último intercambio), y exige que al menos conozca otro movimiento.

Name: Lava Plume
Description (Short): 30% chance to burn adjacent Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 用熊熊烈火攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。30%几率使目标会陷入灼伤状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de quemar al rival.

Name: Leafage
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 将叶片打向对手，进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Leaf Blade
Description (Short): High critical hit ratio.
Description (Chinese Short): 像用剑一般操纵叶片切斩对手进行攻击。容易击中要害。
Description (Spanish Short): Alta probabilidad de Golpe Crítico.

Name: Leaf Storm
Description (Short): Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 用尖尖的叶片向对手卷起风暴。使用之后因为反作用力会使自己的特攻降低2级。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de reducir dos niveles el Ataque Especial al usuario.

Name: Leaf Tornado
Description (Short): 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用锋利的叶片包裹住对手进行攻击。50%几率降低对手的命中率1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 50% de reducir un nivel la Precisión al rival.

Name: Leech Life
Description (Short): User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 吸取血液攻击对手。可以回复给予对手伤害的一半ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera PS equivalente a la mitad del daño causado.

Name: Leech Seed
Description (Short): 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 植入寄生种子后，将在每回合一点一点吸取对手最大HP1/8的ＨＰ，从而用来回复自己的ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): Hace perder al rival un 12.5% de su PS cada turno, y lo transfiere a nuestro Pokémon. Inefectivo contra Pokémon de tipo Planta.

Name: Leer
Description (Short): Lowers the foe(s) Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用犀利的眼神使其害怕，从而降低对手的防御1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel la Defensa al rival.

Name: Let's Snuggle Forever
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的谜拟Ｑ将全力进行乱揍攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): No additional effect.

Name: Lick
Description (Short): 30% chance to paralyze the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用长长的舌头，舔遍对手进行攻击。30%几率让对手陷入麻痹状态。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de paralizar al rival.

Name: Life Dew
Description (Short): Heals the user and its allies by 1/4 their max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 喷洒出神奇的水，回复自己和场上同伴1/4的ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): Heals the user and its allies by 1/4 their max HP.

Name: Light of Ruin
Description (Short): Has 1/2 recoil.
Description (Chinese Short): 借用永恒之花的力量，发射出强力光线。自己也会受到造成伤害的一半的伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca un daño de retroceso del 50% del daño provocado al Pokémon rival.

Name: Light Screen
Description (Short): For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.
Description (Chinese Short): 在５回合内使用神奇的墙，从对手那受到的特殊攻击的伤害减半。
Description (Spanish Short): Reduce el daño provocado a tu Pokémon por ataques especiales del rival en un 50% (33% en 2vs2) durante 5 turnos.

Name: Light That Burns the Sky
Description (Short): Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.
Description (Chinese Short): 奈克洛兹玛会无视对手的特性效果，在攻击和特攻之间，用数值相对较高的一项给予对方伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Movimiento Z que sólo puede ser usado una vez por combate. Sólo puede ser utilizado por Necrozma con Ultranecrostal Z equipado. El daño de este ataque se calcula con el stat de Ataque o de Ataque Especial, en función de cuál sea más alto.

Name: Liquidation
Description (Short): 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用水之力量撞向对手进行攻击。20%几率降低对手的防御1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 20% de reducir un nivel la Defensa al rival.

Name: Lock-On
Description (Short): User's next move will not miss the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 紧紧瞄准对手，下次攻击必定会打中。
Description (Spanish Short): El siguiente movimiento que utilice el Pokémon no fallará.

Name: Lovely Kiss
Description (Short): Causes the target to fall asleep.
Description (Chinese Short): 用恐怖的脸强吻对手。让对手陷入睡眠状态。
Description (Spanish Short): Provoca Sueño.

Name: Low Kick
Description (Short): More power the heavier the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用力踢对手的脚，使其摔倒进行攻击。对手越重，威力越大。
Description (Spanish Short): Este movimiento tiene un poder base variable entre 20 y 120, en función del peso del Pokémon rival.

Name: Low Sweep
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 以敏捷的动作瞄准对手的脚进行攻击。100%几率降低对手的速度1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja un nivel la Velocidad al rival.

Name: Lucky Chant
Description (Short): For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.
Description (Chinese Short): 向天许愿，从而在５回合内不会被对手的攻击打中要害。
Description (Spanish Short): El equipo del usuario no recibe Golpes Críticos por 5 turnos.

Name: Lunar Dance
Description (Short): User faints. Replacement is fully healed, with PP.
Description (Chinese Short): 虽然自己陷入濒死，但可以治愈后备上场的宝可梦的全部HP和异常状态。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario cae debilitado. El Pokémon que salga a la batalla en su lugar ve recuperados sus PS, PP y estado alterado.

Name: Lunge
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 全力猛扑对手进行攻击。100%几率降低对手的攻击1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de reducir un nivel el Ataque al rival.

Name: Luster Purge
Description (Short): 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 释放耀眼的光芒进行攻击。50%几率降低对手的特防1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 50% de reducir un nivel la Defensa Especial al rival.

Name: Mach Punch
Description (Short): Usually goes first.
Description (Chinese Short): 以迅雷不及掩耳之势出拳。必定能够先制攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Golpea primero.

Name: Magical Leaf
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 散落可以追踪对手的神奇叶片。攻击必定会命中。
Description (Spanish Short): Siempre golpea.

Name: Magic Coat
Description (Short): Bounces back certain non-damaging moves.
Description (Chinese Short): 当对手使出会变成异常状态的招式或寄生种子等时，会将对手的招式反射回去。
Description (Spanish Short): Refleja al Pokémon rival los efectos de movimientos que no causan daño (modificador, estado alterado, confusión, atracción, trampa, drenadoras, abatidoras, bilis).

Name: Magic Powder
Description (Short): Changes the target's type to Psychic.
Description (Chinese Short): 向对手喷洒魔法粉，使对手变为超能力属性。
Description (Spanish Short): Changes the target's type to Psychic.

Name: Magic Room
Description (Short): For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 制造出离奇的空间。在５回合内所有宝可梦携带道具的效果都会消失。
Description (Spanish Short): Por 5 turnos los objetos equipados por los Pokémon no surten efecto.

Name: Magma Storm
Description (Short): Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.
Description (Chinese Short): 将对手困在熊熊燃烧的火焰中，在４～５回合内进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): El Pokémon rival permanece atrapado de 4 a 5 turnos, recibiendo un daño del 12.5% del PS cada turno.

Name: Magnet Bomb
Description (Short): This move does not check accuracy.
Description (Chinese Short): 发射吸住对手的钢铁炸弹。攻击必定会命中。
Description (Spanish Short): Siempre golpea.

Name: Magnetic Flux
Description (Short): Raises Def, Sp. Def of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过操控磁场，100%几率提高己方所有特性为正电和负电的宝可梦的防御和特防各1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel la Defensa y la Defensa Especial al usuario y sus aliados con la habilidad Más o Menos.

Name: Magnet Rise
Description (Short): For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.
Description (Chinese Short): 利用电气产生的磁力浮在空中。在５回合内可以飘浮。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario es inmune a los ataques de tipo Tierra durante 5 turnos.

Name: Magnitude
Description (Short): Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.
Description (Chinese Short): 晃动地面，攻击自己周围所有的宝可梦。招式的威力会有各种变化。
Description (Spanish Short): Este movimiento tiene un poder base variable entre 10 y 150. El daño es doble si golpea a un Pokémon en mitad de una excavación.

Name: Malicious Moonsault
Description (Short): Damage doubles if the target used Minimize.
Description (Chinese Short): 通过Ｚ力量得到强壮肉体的炽焰咆哮虎将全力撞向对手进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Movimiento Z que sólo puede ser usado una vez por combate. Sólo puede ser utilizado por Incineroar con Incinostal Z equipado.

Name: Mat Block
Description (Short): Protects allies from damaging attacks. Turn 1 only.
Description (Chinese Short): 将掀起来的榻榻米当作盾牌，防住自己和同伴免受招式伤害。变化招式无法防住。
Description (Spanish Short): Evita todo daño directo y efectos de movimientos del rival para él y sus aliados. No evita movimientos de estado. Sólo puede ser utilizado el primer turno del usuario tras ser intercambiado.

Name: Max Airstream
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Speed.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的飞行属性攻击。100%几率提升我方的速度1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Speed.

Name: Max Darkness
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Def.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的恶属性攻击。100%几率降低对手的特防1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Def.

Name: Max Flare
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Sunny Day.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的火属性攻击。可在５回合内将天气变为大晴天。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Starts Sunny Day.

Name: Max Flutterby
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Atk.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的虫属性攻击。100%几率降低对手的特攻1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Atk.

Name: Max Geyser
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Rain Dance.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的水属性攻击。可在５回合内将天气变为降雨。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Starts Rain Dance.

Name: Max Guard
Description (Short): Protects user from moves & Max Moves this turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 完全抵挡对手的攻击。连续使出则容易失败。
Description (Spanish Short): Protects user from moves & Max Moves this turn.

Name: Max Hailstorm
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Hail.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦才能使出的冰属性攻击。在５回合内会降下冰雹。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Starts Hail.

Name: Max Knuckle
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Attack.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的格斗属性攻击。100%几率提升我方的攻击1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Attack.

Name: Max Lightning
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Electric Terrain.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的电属性攻击。可在５回合内将脚下变成电气场地。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Starts Electric Terrain.

Name: Max Mindstorm
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Psychic Terrain.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的超能力属性攻击。可在５回合内将脚下变成精神场地。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Starts Psychic Terrain.

Name: Max Ooze
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Atk.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的毒属性攻击。100%几率提升我方的特攻1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Atk.

Name: Max Overgrowth
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Grassy Terrain.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的草属性攻击。可在５回合内将脚下变成青草场地。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Starts Grassy Terrain.

Name: Max Phantasm
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Defense.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的幽灵属性攻击。100%几率降低对手的防御1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Defense.

Name: Max Quake
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Def.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的地面属性攻击。100%几率提升我方的特防1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Def.

Name: Max Rockfall
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Sandstorm.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的岩石属性攻击。可在５回合内将天气变为沙暴。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Starts Sandstorm.

Name: Max Starfall
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Starts Misty Terrain.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的妖精属性攻击。可在５回合内将脚下变成薄雾场地。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Starts Misty Terrain.

Name: Max Steelspike
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Defense.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的钢属性攻击。100%几率提升我方的防御1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Defense.

Name: Max Strike
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Speed.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的一般属性攻击。100%几率降低对手的速度1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Speed.

Name: Max Wyrmwind
Description (Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Attack.
Description (Chinese Short): 极巨化宝可梦使出的龙属性攻击。100%几率降低对手的攻击1级。
Description (Spanish Short): Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Attack.

Name: Mean Look
Description (Short): Prevents the target from switching out.
Description (Chinese Short): 用好似要勾人心魂的黑色目光一动不动地凝视对手，使其不能从战斗中逃走。
Description (Spanish Short): Impide al rival ser intercambiado, salvo usando Relevo, Ida y Vuelta, Voltiocambio o Última Palabra, o si tiene Muda Concha o Botón Escape.

Name: Meditate
Description (Short): Raises the user's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 唤醒身体深处沉睡的力量，从而提高自己的攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta un nivel el Ataque al usuario.

Name: Me First
Description (Short): Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.
Description (Chinese Short): 提高威力，抢先使出对手想要使出的招式。如果不先使出则会失败。
Description (Spanish Short): Siempre que el usuario sea el primero en moverse y que el rival haya elegido un ataque de daño directo, el usuario copia el ataque del rival y le golpea con su poder al 150%.

Name: Mega Drain
Description (Short): User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
Description (Chinese Short): 吸取对手的养分进行攻击。可以回复给予对手伤害的一半ＨＰ。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera PS equivalente a la mitad del daño causado.

Name: Megahorn
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用坚硬且华丽的角狠狠地刺入对手进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Mega Kick
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出力大无穷的重踢踢飞对手进行攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Mega Punch
Description (Short): No additional effect.
Description (Chinese Short): 用充满力量的拳头攻击对手。
Description (Spanish Short): Ninguno.

Name: Memento
Description (Short): Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.
Description (Chinese Short): 虽然会使自己陷入濒死，但是有100%几率能够低对手的攻击和特攻各2级。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario se debilita. Baja dos niveles el Ataque y el Ataque Especial del rival.

Name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
Description (Short): Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 得到Ｚ力量的露奈雅拉将全力进行攻击。可以无视对手的特性效果。
Description (Spanish Short): Movimiento Z que sólo puede ser usado una vez por combate. Sólo puede ser utilizado por Lunala con Lunalastal Z equipado. Ignora las habilidades de los Pokémon en juego.

Name: Metal Burst
Description (Short): If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.
Description (Chinese Short): 使出招式前，将最后受到的招式的伤害大力返还给对手。
Description (Spanish Short): Causa un daño equivalente al 150% del daño causado por el ataque del rival ese turno. Debe ser utilizado después del ataque del rival.

Name: Metal Claw
Description (Short): 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 用钢铁之爪劈开对手进行攻击。10%几率提高自己的攻击1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 10% de aumentar un nivel el Ataque al usuario.

Name: Metal Sound
Description (Short): Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 让对手听摩擦金属般讨厌的声音。大幅降低对手的特防。
Description (Spanish Short): Baja dos niveles la Defensa Especial al rival.

Name: Meteor Assault
Description (Short): User cannot move next turn.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。下一回合自己将无法动弹。
Description (Spanish Short): User cannot move next turn.

Name: Meteor Beam
Description (Short): Raises user's Sp. Atk by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 第一回合进行蓄力，同时令使用者的特攻提升1级，第二回合发动攻击。
Description (Spanish Short): Raises user's Sp. Atk by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

Name: Meteor Mash
Description (Short): 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。20%几率令使用者的攻击提升1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 20% de aumentar un nivel el Ataque al usuario.

Name: Metronome
Description (Short): Picks a random move.
Description (Chinese Short): 在所有招式中随机选择1个招式并使用。
Description (Spanish Short): Usa un movimiento al azar.

Name: Milk Drink
Description (Short): Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.
Description (Chinese Short): 恢复使用者的50%的ＨＰ值。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera el 50% de su PS máximo.

Name: Mimic
Description (Short): The last move the target used replaces this one.
Description (Chinese Short): 招式替换为目标最后使用的招式，ＰＰ改变为5。
Description (Spanish Short): Este movimiento se ve sustituido por el último ataque utilizado por el Pokémon rival (con 5 PP) por el resto de la batalla o hasta su intercambio.

Name: Mind Blown
Description (Short): User loses 50% max HP. Hits adjacent Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。使用者的ＨＰ减少最大ＨＰ的一半。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recibe un daño equivalente al 50% de su PS máximo.

Name: Mind Reader
Description (Short): User's next move will not miss the target.
Description (Chinese Short): 用心感受对手的行动，下次攻击必定会击中对手。
Description (Spanish Short): El siguiente movimiento que utilice el Pokémon no fallará.

Name: Minimize
Description (Short): Raises the user's evasiveness by 2.
Description (Chinese Short): 令使用者的闪避率提升2级。
Description (Spanish Short): Aumenta dos niveles la Evasión. El Pokémon recibe el doble de daño de Pisotón y Rodillo de Púas, que no ven reducida su precisión.

Name: Miracle Eye
Description (Short): Psychic hits Dark. Evasiveness ignored.
Description (Chinese Short): 对恶属性宝可梦没有效果的招式以及闪避率高的对手，使用后变得能够打中。
Description (Spanish Short): Mientras el usuario siga en batalla, se ignoran los modificadores de Evasión del rival y de Precisión del usuario. Anula la inmunidad del tipo Siniestro frente al tipo Psíquico.

Name: Mirror Coat
Description (Short): If hit by special attack, returns double damage.
Description (Chinese Short): 造成使用者上一次受到的特殊伤害×2的固定伤害。
Description (Spanish Short): Si el usuario es golpeado por un ataque especial el mismo turno en que usa este movimiento, le devolverá al atacante el doble del daño recibido.

Name: Mirror Move
Description (Short): User uses the target's last used move against it.
Description (Chinese Short): 使用目标最后使用过的招式。
Description (Spanish Short): Usa el último movimiento que ha utilizado el Pokémon rival.

Name: Mirror Shot
Description (Short): 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。30%几率令目标的命中率降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de reducir un nivel la Precisión al rival.

Name: Mist
Description (Short): For 5 turns, protects user's party from stat drops.
Description (Chinese Short): 使己方场地在5回合内处于白雾状态。处于白雾状态的场地上的宝可梦的能力变化不会下降。
Description (Spanish Short): Impide las reducciones de stats por parte de los movimientos del rival o tu compañero durante 5 turnos.

Name: Mist Ball
Description (Short): 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。50%几率令目标的特攻降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 50% de reducir un nivel el Ataque Especial al rival.

Name: Misty Explosion
Description (Short): User faints. User on Misty Terrain: 1.5x power.
Description (Chinese Short): 对自己周围的所有宝可梦进行攻击，自己陷入濒死。在薄雾场地上，招式威力会提高50%。
Description (Spanish Short): User faints. User on Misty Terrain: 1.5x power.

Name: Misty Terrain
Description (Short): 5 turns. Can't status,-Dragon power vs grounded.
Description (Chinese Short): 5回合内地面上的宝可梦免受异常状态影响。使龙属性招式的伤害减半。
Description (Spanish Short): Crea un campo de niebla durante 5 turnos. Los Pokémon en el suelo no pueden ver alterado su estado, y reciben la mitad de daño de ataques de tipo Dragón.

Name: Moonblast
Description (Short): 30% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。30%几率令目标的特攻降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de reducir un nivel el Ataque Especial al rival.

Name: Moongeist Beam
Description (Short): Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。攻击时能够使目标特性失效。
Description (Spanish Short): Ignora las habilidades de los Pokémon en juego.

Name: Moonlight
Description (Short): Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.
Description (Chinese Short): 月光恢复使用者的ＨＰ值。恢复量由当前天气决定。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera 66.6% PS en Día Soleado, 50% PS si no hay clima, y 25% en Llovizna, Granizo o Tormenta de Arena.

Name: Morning Sun
Description (Short): Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.
Description (Chinese Short): 晨光恢复使用者的ＨＰ值。恢复量由当前天气决定。
Description (Spanish Short): El usuario recupera 66.6% PS en Día Soleado, 50% PS si no hay clima, y 25% en Llovizna, Granizo o Tormenta de Arena.

Name: Mud Bomb
Description (Short): 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。30%几率令目标的命中率降低1级。
Description (Spanish Short): 30% de reducir un nivel la Precisión al rival.

Name: Mud Shot
Description (Short): 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.
Description (Chinese Short): 攻击目标造成伤害。100%几率令目标的速度降低1级
Description (Spanish Short): 100% de reducir un nivel la Velocidad al rival.

Name: Mud-Slap
